de.emgress
Class ViewPagerTitleExample.ViewPagerFragmentAdapter

java.lang.Object
  android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      android.support.v4.app.FragmentPagerAdapter
          de.emgress.ViewPagerTitleExample.ViewPagerFragmentAdapter
Enclosing class:
ViewPagerTitleExample
public static class ViewPagerTitleExample.ViewPagerFragmentAdapter
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentPagerAdapter

This adapter is used to supply the ViewPager with the contents of the different pages. In this case, these are simple Fragments that display the Fragments title as well as a ListView.

Those Fragments extend from the ListFragment class.

The adapter will create as much pages as there are tabs in the ActionBar. That said, the number of Tabs is defined by the number of elements in the tabNames Array. configureViews, tabNames

One note of caution: Having such a tight coupling between the adapter and the ActionBar is fine for this little example. However, in a full- fledged application, one would make sure that the Adapter does not need a reference to the ActionBar. It's only purpose is to create and supply the different pages for the ViewPager!
